name: 2024 The 6th International Conference on Power and Energy Technology
content: Publication and Indexing: Submissions will be peer-reviewed and evaluated based on originality, relevance to conference, contributions, and presentation. Accepted full papers will be collected in ICPET 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus etc. major databases.
